title: New Year's Knight
description:
IT HAPPENED ONE NIGHT

'Twas the Night Before New Year's…

And all through the house, everybody was celebrating… except Gina Tarantino. Ringing in the New Year only made her realize how lonely she was. But at the stroke of midnight, she found herself in a passionate embrace with a sexy stranger. An embrace that continued well after the party was over….Bad boy Jackson Gray was a true loner. But after a heated night of love with Gina, he was starting to reconsider. Unfortunately, all Gina wanted was a single night. Could Jackson convince her that practice makes perfect?
It Happened One Night

A single sizzling night of love…could lead anywhere!
author: Lyn Ellis
